Alexis' Journal ...with time I shall be less and less a worker of misfortune...

  • About

    Alexis Purslane

    Hi! I’m a poly trans lesbian interested in writing and philosophy. My philosphical outlook is existentialist athiest and queer, egoist, mutualist anarchist, with interests in Daoism and perspectivism. I have OCD, GAD, autism, possibly ADHD, and chronic tension migraines. I am currently enrolled in the computer science baccalaureate program at Penn State University.
